title: Electrum RPC - mempool - Bitcoin Explorer
html:
Hostname

mempool.space

Port

50002

SSL

Enabled

Electrum RPC interface for Bitcoin Signet is publicly available. Electrum RPC interface for all other networks is available to sponsors only—whitelisting is required.

title: REST API - mempool - Bitcoin Explorer
html:
Below is a reference for the Bitcoin Service d'API REST.

Note that we enforce rate limits. If you exceed these limits, you will get an HTTP 429 error. If you repeatedly exceed the limits, you may be banned from accessing the service altogether. Consider an enterprise sponsorship if you need higher API limits.

GET Difficulty Adjustment
GENERAL
Point de terminaison
GET /api/v1/difficulty-adjustment
Description
Returns details about difficulty adjustment.
cURL
CommonJS
ES Module
Exemple de code
curl -sSL "https://mempool.space/api/v1/difficulty-adjustment"
Réponse
{
  progressPercent: 44.397234501112074,
  difficultyChange: 98.45932018381687,
  estimatedRetargetDate: 1627762478,
  remainingBlocks: 1121,
  remainingTime: 665977,
  previousRetarget: -4.807005268478962,
  nextRetargetHeight: 741888,
  timeAvg: 302328,
  timeOffset: 0
}
GET Address
ADDRESSES
Point de terminaison
GET /api/address/:address
Description
Returns details about an address. Available fields: address, chain_stats, and mempool_stats. chain_stats and mempool_stats each contain an object with tx_count, funded_txo_count, funded_txo_sum, spent_txo_count, and spent_txo_sum.
cURL
CommonJS
ES Module
Exemple de code
curl -sSL "https://mempool.space/api/address/1wiz18xYmhRX6xStj2b9t1rwWX4GKUgpv"
Réponse
{
  address: "1wiz18xYmhRX6xStj2b9t1rwWX4GKUgpv",
  chain_stats: {
    funded_txo_count: 5,
    funded_txo_sum: 15007599040,
    spent_txo_count: 5,
    spent_txo_sum: 15007599040,
    tx_count: 7
  },
  mempool_stats: {
    funded_txo_count: 0,
    funded_txo_sum: 0,
    spent_txo_count: 0,
    spent_txo_sum: 0,
    tx_count: 0
  }
}
GET Address Transactions
ADDRESSES
Point de terminaison
GET /api/address/:address/txs
Description
Get transaction history for the specified address/scripthash, sorted with newest first. Returns up to 50 mempool transactions plus the first 25 confirmed transactions. You can request more confirmed transactions using :last_seen_txid (see below).
cURL
CommonJS
ES Module
Exemple de code
curl -sSL "https://mempool.space/api/address/1wiz18xYmhRX6xStj2b9t1rwWX4GKUgpv/txs"
Réponse
[
  {
    txid: "dba43fd04b7ae3df8e5b596f2e7fab247c58629d622e3a5213f03a5a09684430",
    version: 1,
    locktime: 0,
    vin: [ [Object] ],
    vout: [ [Object], [Object] ],
    size: 255,
    weight: 1020,
    fee: 10000,
    status: {
      confirmed: true,
      block_height: 326148,
      block_hash: "00000000000000001e4118adcfbb02364bc13c41c210d8811e4f39aeb3687e36",
      block_time: 1413798020
    }
  },
  ...
]

ADDRESSES

GET /api/address/:address/txs/chain
Description
Get confirmed transaction history for the specified address/scripthash, sorted with newest first. Returns 25 transactions per page. More can be requested by specifying the last txid seen by the previous query.
cURL
CommonJS
ES Module
Exemple de code
curl -sSL "https://mempool.space/api/address/1wiz18xYmhRX6xStj2b9t1rwWX4GKUgpv/txs/chain"
Réponse
[
  {
    txid: "c4e53c2e37f4fac759fdb0d8380e4d49e6c7211233ae276a44ce7074a1d6d168",
    version: 2,
    locktime: 697761,
    vin: [],
    vout: [],
    size: 221,
    weight: 884,
    fee: 331,
    status: {
      confirmed: true,
      block_height: 697782,
      block_hash: "000000000000000000011397e53a5b1442b3dbc5df046c959c11dfe0275a4579",
      block_time: 1630040570
    }
  },
  ...
],
GET Address Transactions Mempool
ADDRESSES
Point de terminaison
GET /api/address/:address/txs/mempool
Description
Get unconfirmed transaction history for the specified address/scripthash. Returns up to 50 transactions (no paging).
cURL
CommonJS
ES Module
Exemple de code
curl -sSL "https://mempool.space/api/address/1wiz18xYmhRX6xStj2b9t1rwWX4GKUgpv/txs/mempool"
Réponse
[
  {
    txid: "16cd9bbc6b62313a22d16671fa559aec6bf581df8b5853d37775c84b0fddfa90",
    version: 2,
    locktime: 0,
    vin: [ [Object] ],
    vout: [ [Object], [Object] ],
    size: 226,
    weight: 904,
    fee: 6720,
    status: { confirmed: false }
  }
]

ADDRESSES
Point de terminaison
GET /api/address/:address/utxo
Description
Get the list of unspent transaction outputs associated with the address/scripthash. Available fields: txid, vout, value, and status (with the status of the funding tx).
cURL
CommonJS
ES Module
Exemple de code
curl -sSL "https://mempool.space/api/address/1KFHE7w8BhaENAswwryaoccDb6qcT6DbYY/utxo"
Réponse
[
  {
    txid: "12f96289f8f9cd51ccfe390879a46d7eeb0435d9e0af9297776e6bdf249414ff",

      block_hash: "00000000000000000007839f42e0e86fd53c797b64b7135fcad385158c9cafb8",
      block_time: 1630561459

    value: 644951084
  },

]

Point de terminaison
GET /api/block/:hash/header
Description
Returns the hex-encoded block header.

040000202c04d4c450187d1da9b1bc23ba47d67fe028d22486fd0c00000000000000000059a3a33d4642c799af9f54a4dd351fff9130e6a89d4e251130c60064878616e906b5ea60ce9813173a25caf3
GET Block Height

Point de terminaison
GET /api/block-height/:height
Description
Returns the hash of the block currently at :height.

CommonJS
ES Module
Exemple de code
curl -sSL "https://mempool.space/api/block-height/615615"

000000000000000000067bea442af50a91377ac796e63b8d284354feff4042b3
GET Block Raw
BLOCKS
Point de terminaison
GET /api/block/:hash/raw
Description
Returns the raw block representation in binary.
cURL
CommonJS
ES Module
Exemple de code
curl -sSL "https://mempool.space/api/block/0000000000000000000065bda8f8a88f2e1e00d9a6887a43d640e52a4c7660f2/raw"
GET Block Status
BLOCKS
Point de terminaison
GET /api/block/:hash/status
Description
Returns the confirmation status of a block. Available fields: in_best_chain (boolean, false for orphaned blocks), next_best (the hash of the next block, only available for blocks in the best chain).
cURL
CommonJS
ES Module
Exemple de code
curl -sSL "https://mempool.space/api/block/0000000000000000000065bda8f8a88f2e1e00d9a6887a43d640e52a4c7660f2/status"
Réponse
{
  in_best_chain: true,
  height: 690557,
  next_best: "00000000000000000003a59a34c93e39e636c8cd23ead726fdc467fbed0b7c5a"
}

GET /api/block/:hash/txs[/:start_index]

ES Module
Exemple de code

GET Blocks (Bulk)
BLOCKS
Point de terminaison
GET /api/v1/blocks-bulk/:minHeight[/:maxHeight]
Description

Returns details on the range of blocks between :minHeight and :maxHeight, inclusive, up to 10 blocks. If :maxHeight is not specified, it defaults to the current tip.

To return data for more than 10 blocks, consider becoming an enterprise sponsor.

GET Mining Pools
MINING
Point de terminaison
GET /api/v1/mining/pools[/:timePeriod]
Description
Returns a list of all known mining pools ordered by blocks found over the specified trailing :timePeriod.

Leave :timePeriod unspecified to get all available data, or specify one of the following values: 24h, 3d, 1w, 1m, 3m, 6m, 1y, 2y, 3y.

cURL
Exemple de code
curl -sSL "https://mempool.space/api/v1/mining/pools/1w"
Réponse
{
  "pools": [
  {
    "poolId": 111,
    "name": "Foundry USA",
    "link": "https://foundrydigital.com/",
    "blockCount": 194,
    "rank": 1,
    "emptyBlocks": 0,
    "slug": "foundryusa"

GET Hashrate
MINING
Point de terminaison
GET /api/v1/mining/hashrate/[:timePeriod]
Description

Returns network-wide hashrate and difficulty figures over the specified trailing :timePeriod:

Current (real-time) hashrate
Current (real-time) difficulty
Historical daily average hashrates
Historical difficulty

Valid values for :timePeriod are 1m, 3m, 6m, 1y, 2y, 3y. If no time interval is specified, all available data is returned.

Be sure that INDEXING_BLOCKS_AMOUNT is set properly in your backend config so that enough blocks are indexed to properly serve your request.

title: REST API - mempool - Bitcoin Explorer
html:
Below is a reference for the Bitcoin Service d'API REST.

Note that we enforce rate limits. If you exceed these limits, you will get an HTTP 429 error. If you repeatedly exceed the limits, you may be banned from accessing the service altogether. Consider an enterprise sponsorship if you need higher API limits.

GET Difficulty Adjustment
GENERAL
Point de terminaison
GET /api/v1/difficulty-adjustment
Description
Returns details about difficulty adjustment.
cURL
CommonJS
ES Module
Exemple de code
curl -sSL "https://mempool.space/api/v1/difficulty-adjustment"
Réponse
{
  progressPercent: 44.397234501112074,
  difficultyChange: 98.45932018381687,
  estimatedRetargetDate: 1627762478,
  remainingBlocks: 1121,
  remainingTime: 665977,
  previousRetarget: -4.807005268478962,
  nextRetargetHeight: 741888,
  timeAvg: 302328,
  timeOffset: 0
}
GET Address
ADDRESSES
Point de terminaison
GET /api/address/:address
Description
Returns details about an address. Available fields: address, chain_stats, and mempool_stats. chain_stats and mempool_stats each contain an object with tx_count, funded_txo_count, funded_txo_sum, spent_txo_count, and spent_txo_sum.
cURL
CommonJS
ES Module
Exemple de code
curl -sSL "https://mempool.space/api/address/1wiz18xYmhRX6xStj2b9t1rwWX4GKUgpv"
Réponse
{
  address: "1wiz18xYmhRX6xStj2b9t1rwWX4GKUgpv",
  chain_stats: {
    funded_txo_count: 5,
    funded_txo_sum: 15007599040,
    spent_txo_count: 5,
    spent_txo_sum: 15007599040,
    tx_count: 7
  },
  mempool_stats: {
    funded_txo_count: 0,
    funded_txo_sum: 0,
    spent_txo_count: 0,
    spent_txo_sum: 0,
    tx_count: 0
  }
}
GET Address Transactions
ADDRESSES
Point de terminaison
GET /api/address/:address/txs
Description
Get transaction history for the specified address/scripthash, sorted with newest first. Returns up to 50 mempool transactions plus the first 25 confirmed transactions. You can request more confirmed transactions using :last_seen_txid (see below).
cURL
CommonJS
ES Module
Exemple de code
curl -sSL "https://mempool.space/api/address/1wiz18xYmhRX6xStj2b9t1rwWX4GKUgpv/txs"
Réponse
[
  {
    txid: "dba43fd04b7ae3df8e5b596f2e7fab247c58629d622e3a5213f03a5a09684430",
    version: 1,
    locktime: 0,
    vin: [ [Object] ],
    vout: [ [Object], [Object] ],
    size: 255,
    weight: 1020,
    fee: 10000,
    status: {
      confirmed: true,
      block_height: 326148,
      block_hash: "00000000000000001e4118adcfbb02364bc13c41c210d8811e4f39aeb3687e36",
      block_time: 1413798020
    }
  },
  ...
]

ADDRESSES
Point de terminaison
GET /api/address/:address/txs/chain
Description
Get confirmed transaction history for the specified address/scripthash, sorted with newest first. Returns 25 transactions per page. More can be requested by specifying the last txid seen by the previous query.
cURL
CommonJS
ES Module
Exemple de code
curl -sSL "https://mempool.space/api/address/1wiz18xYmhRX6xStj2b9t1rwWX4GKUgpv/txs/chain"
Réponse
[

Point de terminaison

Description
Get unconfirmed transaction history for the specified address/scripthash. Returns up to 50 transactions (no paging).

GET Mining Pool Hashrates

GET /api/v1/mining/hashrate/pools/[:timePeriod]

GET Hashrate
MINING
Point de terminaison
GET /api/v1/mining/hashrate/[:timePeriod]
Description

Returns network-wide hashrate and difficulty figures over the specified trailing :timePeriod:

Current (real-time) hashrate
Current (real-time) difficulty
Historical daily average hashrates
Historical difficulty

Valid values for :timePeriod are 1m, 3m, 6m, 1y, 2y, 3y. If no time interval is specified, all available data is returned.

Be sure that INDEXING_BLOCKS_AMOUNT is set properly in your backend config so that enough blocks are indexed to properly serve your request.

cURL
Exemple de code
curl -sSL "https://mempool.space/api/v1/mining/hashrate/3d"
Réponse
{
  "hashrates": [
    {
      "timestamp": 1652486400,
      "avgHashrate": 236499762108771800000
    },

      "timestamp": 1652572800,

    },
    {
      "timestamp": 1652659200,
      "avgHashrate": 189877203506913000000
    }
  ],
  "difficulty": [
    {
      "timestamp": 1652468330,

GET Block Fees
MINING
Point de terminaison
GET /api/v1/mining/blocks/fees/:timePeriod
Description

Returns average total fees for blocks in the specified :timePeriod, ordered oldest to newest. :timePeriod can be any of the following: 24h, 3d, 1w, 1m, 3m, 6m, 1y, 2y, 3y.

For 24h and 3d time periods, every block is included and fee amounts are exact (not averages). For the 1w time period, fees may be averages depending on how fast blocks were found around a particular timestamp. For other time periods, fees are averages.

POST Transaction
TRANSACTIONS
Point de terminaison
POST /api/tx
Description
Broadcast a raw transaction to the network. The transaction should be provided as hex in the request body. The txid will be returned on success.
cURL
CommonJS
ES Module
Exemple de code
curl -X POST -sSLd "" "https://mempool.space/api/tx"
GET Network Stats
LIGHTNING
Point de terminaison
GET /api/v1/lightning/statistics/:interval
Description

Returns network-wide stats such as total number of channels and nodes, total capacity, and average/median fee figures.

Pass one of the following for :interval: latest, 24h, 3d, 1w, 1m, 3m, 6m, 1y, 2y, 3y.

cURL
Exemple de code
curl -sSL "https://mempool.space/api/v1/lightning/statistics/latest"
Réponse
{
  "latest": {
    "id": 163,
    "added": "2022-08-30T00:00:00.000Z",

    "node_count": 15851,

GET Channels from Node Pubkey
LIGHTNING
Point de terminaison
GET /api/v1/lightning/channels?public_key=:pubKey&status=:channelStatus
Description

Returns a list of a node's channels given its :pubKey. Ten channels are returned at a time. Use :index for paging. :channelStatus can be open, active, or closed.

cURL
Exemple de code
curl -sSL "https://mempool.space/api/v1/lightning/channels?public_key=026165850492521f4ac8abd9bd8088123446d126f648ca35e60f88177dc149ceb2&status=open"
